org.shared.net.nio

Interface NioConnection.WriteHandler

  • Enclosing class:
    NioConnection

    protected static interface NioConnection.WriteHandler
    Defines a handler for outgoing data.

      int write(ByteBuffer bb)
      Attempts to write out the contents of a ByteBuffer.

      • write

        int write(ByteBuffer bb)
        Attempts to write out the contents of a ByteBuffer.
        Returns:
